alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 4:26PM CDT until July 22 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Phelps County in south central Nebraska... Northwestern Kearney County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern Buffalo County in south central Nebraska... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 424 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Odessa, or 11 miles southwest of Kearney. Another severe thunderstorm was located just south-southwest of Kearney, both storms are moving south at about 15 mph HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Axtell and rural portions of the county between Interstate 80 and Highway 6. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 255 and 271. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
